content.text: Not much, just hanging out. I can't wait for this weekend! I'm going to a Disney theme park!
That sounds like fun! I've never been to a Disney theme park.
You should totally go! They're so much fun! I've been to Disney World a few times, and I love it.
I've heard good things about Disney World. I'm sure it's amazing.
It really is. I'm going to Disneyland this weekend, and I can't wait to see what it's like.
I hope you have a great time!
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to sing, skateboard, and hang out with my friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I like to sing too.
Really? That's awesome! What kind of music do you like to sing?
I like to sing a variety of music, but I mostly like to sing country music.
Oh, that's cool. I like to sing country music too.
Cool! Maybe we could sing together sometime.
Great! We'll have to make it happen.
